## REQUIRED DATA
- state-level vote shares for presidential elections from 1972 onward
- presidential approval ratings for Q2 in election years from 1972 onward
- party of incumbent president, 1968 onward
- quarterly state-level and national economic variables:
  - GDP
  - personal income
  - unemployment rates
  - population (used as control in estimating home state advantage)
- American Conservative Union ratings of state senators in the before an 
election year
- biographical information:
  - home state of presidential candidates
